alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 2:47PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Putnam, Eastern Marion, Western Putnam, Central Marion and Western Marion Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM Saturday to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam
